page.title: 11THE ELDERLY POPULATION
page.content: EASTBOURNE IS WELL KNOWN FOR THE NUMBER OF ELDERLY PEOPLE LIVING IN THE TOWN.APPROXIMATELY ONE IN THREE OF THE RESIDENTS IS OVER THE AGE OF RETIREMENT.THIS IS VERY IMPORTANT BECAUSE IT IS REFLECTED IN THE SERVICES OF THE TOWN.EVERYTHING MIGHT SEEM TO BE DIRECTED TO THE ELDERLY. HEALTH SERVICES SEEM TO BE WEIGHTED TOWARDS THE OVER 60'S THOUGH THERE MIGHT BE ADEQUATE FACILITIES FOR THE YOUTH OF THE TOWN.ONE EFFECT OF THE IMBALANCE CAN BE SEEN IN THE LIBRARIES WHERE THE BOOKS ARE IN MY OPINION MORE SUITED TO THE OLDER PERSON WITH RELATIVELY FEWER FOR THE YOUNGER PERSON.APART FROM THE LARGE DEPARTMENT STORES,CLOTHES SHOPS TEND TO CATER FOR THE OLDER PERSON.YOU DO NOT GET MANY BOUTIQUE STYLE SHOPS HERE.
